resources.string: This mobile application designed and coded by Emre Baran. Some icons and graphs have CC-BY License. Some of them are free for personal and commercial use. And a few of them are designed by Emre Baran.
Kartik Domadiya : Thank you for Widget Example.
This application is open-source software. You can find the source codes on GitHub: mree58 \nFeel free to contact if you have any ideas or problems with application. Mail: emrebaran.ceng@gmail.com
To place a widget on your homescreen go to widget menu and select this app
This app needs to camera permission for using its flashlight.
Go to permissions settings to grant camera permission
